title: Grief
verses: Psalm 34:18 (WEB) — “Yahweh is near to those who have a broken heart.”
Psalm 147:3 (WEB) — “He heals the broken in heart, and binds up their wounds.”
1 Thessalonians 4:13–14 (WEB) — “Don’t grieve like the rest who have no hope… Jesus died and rose again.”
body: God meets you in sorrow with presence and promise. Lament honestly, remember the hope of resurrection, and receive care from the body of Christ.
prayer: Man of Sorrows, carry me in this valley. Hold my tears, comfort my heart, and anchor me in the hope of Your resurrection. Amen.
